title: Teemo bug
body: Sup Riot. Teemo's shroom will still detonate if you have red trinket 2 activated and he plants one at your feet. It doesn't disable it. It arms and explodes like normal. Cheers.

replies.body:
Heyo! The best place to report bugs is in the Report a Bug sub-boards. This way, the right people can track issues and resolve them as fast as they're able to. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Thanks!
